constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 66 (Thursday, April 21, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. BOEBERT:
H.R. 7548.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8: The Congress shall have Power To lay
and collect Taxes, Duties, Imposts and Excises, to pay the
Debts and provide for the common Defense and general Welfare
of the United States; but all Duties, Imposts and Excises
shall be uniform throughout the United States;
[[Page H4454]]
[Page H4453]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Border Security, Facilitation, and Operations.

title: Securing Americans from Transportation Insanity Act
